channel.title: GameCube on Reaper Co. Desk
channel.description: Recent content in GameCube on Reaper Co. Desk

item.title: Sonic Riders: Tournament Edition
item.description:
Decompilation, recompilation, and modification of Sonic Riders for the GameCube

June 2022 - Present

Link to website: https://www.sonicriders.org/

Link to fork of public repository (differs from development repository): https://github.com/KidWizardOfTheWeb/sonicriderste_KC

Development repository can be shown upon request for reference by hiring managers.

Tech Stack:

  • C
  • C++
  • PowerPC Assembly
  • Python

item.title: Reaper Co. Mod Manager
item.description:
A file management solution for GameCube Mods

October 2025 - Present

Full-Stack desktop application that serves as a file manager for injecting files into extracted GameCube ISOs.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/KidWizardOfTheWeb/ReaperCo.ModManager

Work in progress. Features to be added:

  • Texture support.
  • P2P file transfer using Croc: https://github.com/schollz/croc
  • Improved UI.
  • GameBanana API support.

Tech stack:

  • Python
  • Qt UI/PyQt6
